text:
> It’s be cool to use FLoops.jl for this
The Julia Lab calls would be a cool place for someone like you :wink:

elements.text: It’s be cool to use FLoops.jl for this

text: I’d love to get involved more in this.

elements.text: I’d love to get involved more in this.

text: no, but I could give you an invite. The calls you really need to join though are the ones in conjunction with Julia Computing, for which of course a ton of simulation stuff is being built on this stack but some of it is proprietary so I don't know if we can bring people in off contract. The projects doing this are joint JC and MIT with strict contracts for the IP to ensure no COI issues.

text:
I see. Well, if there’s ways to get involved, I’d love to do so. 

My Julia interests really have been more enticing to me lately than my physics work. Maybe we can find a way to couple this with my PhD program

text: :thinking_face: we don't have any grants in the area, but maybe we can partner with some group. I'll keep that in mind.
